amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $150,000 from being used for the Green Business Incubator Project of Montgomery County, Maryland, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $150,000 from being used for the Green Business Incubator Project of Montgomery County, Maryland, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 318 (Roll no. 563).
